roleset.name: having a great length measurement

example.name: arg1, EXT
example.text: The rest of your OP was just too damned long .

example.name: both args
example.text: The shark was 12 feet long, 8 feet in girth and weighs more than 1300 pounds, according to the fishermen's estimates.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1. Related to lengthen-v.01, elongate-v.01, prolong-v.01.
